nodes.text: Durand was a male Corellian who served as the chairman of the Corellian Council, the ruling body of his homeworld Corellia, centuries before the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. During a passionate debate about subsector zoning bypass regulations, an angry Councilor named Brecourl challenged Durand to a duel in front of the rest of the Council, a duel that Durand won; the incident was famously remembered as the only time someone had been killed on the floor of the Legislature Building.
Durand was first mentioned in the Codex entry for the Corellian Legislature in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, though his species was not identified.
